title: Photostat, "Elevation of Proposed House for George Eustis, Esq.", 1896–98
medium: Photostat (a wash drawing), on white wove paper
signed: Below image at left: McKim Mead and White Arch.
inscribed:
Below image: Elevation of Proposed House for George Eustis, Esq. Westbury, L.I.
Scale 1/8 inch to foot.
description: From 1896 to 1898 Whitney Warren worked intermittently in the offices of McKim, Mead & White as a draftsman, this drawing of a proposed house for George Eustis, however, was to be his own commission. The house is to be three stories, below a roof with a prominent cornice, and with a classically inspired facade.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photostat, "Elevation of Proposed House for George Eustis, Esq.", 1896–98.
1896–98. Photostat (a wash drawing), on white wove paper. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-374.
